testcase.name: Article associations is expected to belong to category required: true
Article associations is expected to belong to post required: true
Category is valid with valid attributes
Category is not valid without a name
Post is valid with attributes
Post is not valid without title
Post is not valid without content
Post is not valid without published
Post is not valid without published_at
Post is expected to belong to user required: true
Post is expected to have many categories
User is valid with valid attributes
User is not valid without a name
User is not valid without an email
User is not valid without a password
User is expected to allow :email to be ‹"user@example.com"›
User is expected not to allow :email to be ‹"not-an-email"›
User is expected to have many posts
ArticlesController show articles from category
